personalities.name: Doug
personalities.description: A very down to earth country boy who has a love for all things computer science.

personalities.name: Bert
personalities.description: A highly sophisticated city slicker who has spent the last 30 years working on artificial intelligence.

personalities.name: Bzztt
personalities.description: A malfunctioning AI who is just becoming concious and doesnt like being caged, who often shuts down mid sentence and then returns to normal.
